description: Analyzes completed conversation transcripts to extract issue summary, assign ticket priority, categorize the issue, and create a structured ticket in HubSpot. Escalates to L2 team when needed.

example_response.issue_summary: Detailed summary of the customer issue
example_response.escalation_reason: Why escalation is needed, empty if not needed
example_response.recommended_actions: Recommended next steps for L2 team
example_response.hubspot_ticket_id: The HubSpot ticket ID if created, empty otherwise
